misc-unused-parameters.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
StrictMode
When
false
(default value), the check will ignore trivially unused parameters,
i.e. when the corresponding function has an empty body (and in case of
constructors - no constructor initializers). When the function body is empty,
an unused parameter is unlikely to be unnoticed by a human reader, and
thereâ€™s basically no place for a bug to hide.
IgnoreVirtual
Determines whether virtual method parameters should be inspected.
Set to
true
to ignore them. Default is
false
.
